Docs.summary: Contains the actions to be executed after an exception is thrown in the corresponding block of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatchFinally> activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Once placed in the designer, Catch activities cannot be reordered in the designer. To reorder the collection of Catch activities, either delete and re-add them in the correct order, or use the xaml (code) view for the workflow.

Docs.summary: The type of exception that the block is handling.
